data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Pinthaeus (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Qing, Rédei, Dávid, Bu, Wenjun (2013): A revision of the genus Pinthaeus (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae). Zootaxa 3636 (1): 59-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3636.1.3
